name: Scribberang
description:
Defeat Scribbles with the power of your eraser boomerang!

Arrows/WASD - Move, Jump, Fall through platforms

Left Click - Throw Eraser

Right Click - Send Eraser back to player

PS: There is a boss in this game, but you'll need to survive for a long time to find him. Good luck!

----------------------------

POST-JAM PATCH (v1.0.1)

  • Made the powerups slower. They were kind of a pain to catch...
  • Powerups take less XP to spawn
  • The eraser return mechanic activates and moves faster
  • You can move through scribbles once they've been defeated. Kinda wanted to have this to begin with, but I forgot to program it in.
